title: Premium Hibachi Combo
description: Our signature hibachi experience with choice of protein, fried rice, mixed vegetables, and our famous yum-yum sauce. The full restaurant experience at your location!
content: Includes: Choice of chicken, beef, shrimp, or salmon • Hibachi fried rice • Mixed grilled vegetables • Yum-yum sauce • Ginger sauce • Teriyaki glaze • Interactive cooking show

title: Chicken Teriyaki Hibachi
description: Tender chicken breast grilled hibachi-style with our signature teriyaki glaze, served with fried rice and vegetables.
content: Juicy chicken breast marinated and grilled fresh on our hibachi grill. Includes hibachi fried rice, mixed vegetables, and choice of sauces. Great for all ages!

title: Hibachi Steak
description: Premium steak cuts grilled to perfection with hibachi seasonings, served with signature fried rice and fresh vegetables.
content: High-quality beef grilled hibachi-style with our special seasonings. Cooked to your preference and served with hibachi fried rice, grilled vegetables, and our signature sauces.

title: Hibachi Shrimp
description: Fresh jumbo shrimp grilled hibachi-style with garlic butter and seasonings, served with fried rice and vegetables.
content: Large, fresh shrimp grilled with garlic butter and hibachi seasonings. Light, flavorful, and perfect for seafood lovers. Includes fried rice and vegetables.

title: Salmon Hibachi
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled hibachi-style with teriyaki glaze, served with signature fried rice and seasonal vegetables.
content: Premium salmon fillet grilled fresh with teriyaki glaze and hibachi seasonings. Healthy and delicious option served with fried rice and grilled vegetables.

title: Vegetarian Hibachi
description: Fresh seasonal vegetables grilled hibachi-style with tofu or extra vegetables, served with vegetable fried rice.
content: Perfect for vegetarians! Fresh seasonal vegetables and tofu grilled with hibachi seasonings. Includes vegetable fried rice made without meat products. Flavorful and satisfying!

title: Kid's Hibachi Plate
description: Child-friendly hibachi meal with choice of chicken or shrimp, fried rice, and vegetables. Perfect portion for children under 12.
content: Specially portioned for kids with mild seasonings. Choice of chicken or shrimp, hibachi fried rice, and vegetables. Interactive cooking show included - kids love watching the chef!

title: Surf & Turf Hibachi
description: The best of both worlds - premium steak and fresh shrimp grilled hibachi-style, served with fried rice and vegetables.
content: Premium combination of hibachi steak and jumbo shrimp. Grilled to perfection with our signature seasonings. Includes hibachi fried rice, vegetables, and full sauce selection.

title: Hibachi Fried Rice
description: Our signature fried rice made fresh on the hibachi grill with eggs, vegetables, and seasonings. Available as a side or main dish.
content: Made fresh on the hibachi grill with eggs, mixed vegetables, and our signature seasonings. Can be made as vegetarian or with choice of protein added.

title: Hibachi Vegetables
description: Fresh seasonal vegetables grilled hibachi-style with garlic butter and seasonings. Perfect side dish or vegetarian option.
content: Fresh zucchini, onions, mushrooms, and seasonal vegetables grilled with garlic butter and hibachi seasonings. Healthy and flavorful side dish.

title: Yum-Yum Sauce
description: Our famous signature sauce! Creamy, tangy, and perfect with any hibachi dish. The sauce everyone asks about!
content: The famous sauce that makes everything better! Creamy, slightly sweet and tangy. Made fresh and served with every meal. Guests always want the recipe!

title: Ginger Sauce
description: Fresh ginger dipping sauce with a mild kick. Traditional Japanese-style sauce perfect for vegetables and seafood.
content: Traditional Japanese ginger sauce made fresh. Light, refreshing with a mild ginger kick. Pairs perfectly with vegetables, seafood, and chicken.
